sentence.Network_en: This ritual filled a void in their lonely, war - torn lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种习惯填补了他们被战争蹂躏的孤寂生活中的空虚.

sentence.Network_en: The war torn city has been brought to destruction.
sentence.Network_cn: 战争摧残过的城市被彻底毁灭了.

sentence.Network_en: The U.S. president on March 1 first visited still war - torn Afghanistan.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一次,美国总统首先于3月1日访问了仍然在战火中的阿富汗.
